com.sun.lwuit.impl.midp
Class CanvasImplementation

java.lang.Object
  com.sun.lwuit.impl.LWUITImplementation
      com.sun.lwuit.impl.midp.GameCanvasImplementation
          com.sun.lwuit.impl.midp.CanvasImplementation

public class CanvasImplementation
extends GameCanvasImplementation

An implementation of LWUIT based on game canvas, this is the default implementation class for LWUIT which most customizers should extend to enhance.
